post.title: panasonic 50"vt30 - setup my tv in pro mode, is thx mode better?
post.content: hey guys, i have setup my 50vt30 in pro mode 1.....for me i think the picture is gorgeous...but i have used it since the beginning, so i dont have experience with other modes...... do you recommend me to change it to thx? and what will be the difference between the 2 modes? i got my vt30 for 6 months now and watched allot of movies, series and soccer games..... cheers, mitch.
